trans-unit.source: Represents a configuration element that specifies authentication settings for a service certificate.
trans-unit.target: 表示指定服務憑證之驗證設定的組態項目。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.X509ServiceCertificateAuthenticationElement" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Configuration.X509ServiceCertificateAuthenticationElement" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the certificate validation mode.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定憑證驗證模式。

trans-unit.source: The certificate validation mode.
trans-unit.target: 憑證驗證模式。

trans-unit.source: The configuration element to be copied.
trans-unit.target: 要複製的組態項目。

trans-unit.source: Copies the content of the specified configuration element to this configuration element.
trans-unit.target: 將指定之組態項目的內容複製到這個組態項目。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="from" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="from" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The configuration file is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 組態檔是唯讀的。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of custom service certificate validator to be used.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定所要使用自訂服務憑證驗證程式的型別。

trans-unit.source: The type of <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509CertificateValidator" /> to be used.
trans-unit.target: 要使用之 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.X509CertificateValidator" /> 的型別。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] provides a default service certificate validator that verifies the service certificate against the trusted people store.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] 提供預設的服務憑證驗證程式，這個驗證程式會針對受信任人存放區來驗證服務憑證。

trans-unit.source: It also verifies that the certificate chains up to a valid root.
trans-unit.target: 它也會驗證憑證鏈結直到有效根憑證。

trans-unit.source: You can implement a custom validator to specify a different behavior and use this property to point to the custom validator.
trans-unit.target: 您可以實作自訂的驗證程式以指定不同的行為，並使用這個屬性指向自訂的驗證程式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the certificate revocation mode.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定憑證撤銷模式。

trans-unit.source: The certificate revocation mode.
trans-unit.target: 憑證撤銷模式。

trans-unit.source: The system verifies that the service certificate has not been revoked by looking it up in the revoked certificate list.
trans-unit.target: 系統會在撤銷憑證清單中查詢，以確認服務憑證尚未被撤銷。

trans-unit.source: This check can be performed either by checking online or against a cached revocation list.
trans-unit.target: 這項檢查可以藉由線上檢查或是針對快取的撤銷清單來執行。

trans-unit.source: Revocation checking can be turned off by setting this property to <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509RevocationMode.NoCheck>.
trans-unit.target: 將此屬性設定為 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509RevocationMode.NoCheck> 可以關閉撤銷檢查。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the trusted store location where the service certificate is validated.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要驗證其中服務憑證的受信任存放區位置。

trans-unit.source: The trusted store location where the service certificate is validated.
trans-unit.target: 受信任存放區位置，在此處驗證服務憑證。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] security system validates the service certificate against a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation>.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] 安全性系統會針對 <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation> 驗證服務憑證。

trans-unit.source: The store location is specified using this property.
trans-unit.target: 存放區位置是使用這個屬性所指定。
